name: Lumos
description: Makes the tip of the wand shine with light.

name: Nox
description: Extinguishes the light produced by Lumos.

name: Alohomora
description: Unlocks doors and locked objects.

name: Wingardium Leviosa
description: Levitates objects.

name: Lumos Solem
description: Produces an intense light simulating sunlight.

name: Aparecium
description: Reveals invisible ink.

name: Obliviate
description: Erases specific memories from a person's mind.

name: Accio
description: Summons objects towards the caster.

name: Reparo
description: Repairs broken objects.

name: Expelliarmus
description: Disarms an opponent.

name: Protego
description: Creates a magical shield to block attacks.

name: Finite Incantatem
description: Ends ongoing spells or effects.

name: Petrificus Totalus
description: Completely petrifies the target.

name: Stupefy
description: Temporarily stuns an opponent.

name: Rictusempra
description: Makes the target laugh uncontrollably and weakens them.

name: Incendio
description: Creates a flame.

name: Crucio
description: Inflicts unbearable pain on the target.

name: Imperio
description: Controls the actions of the target.

name: Avada Kedavra
description: Causes instant death to the target.

name: Expecto Patronum
description: Conjures a Patronus to repel Dementors.

name: Diffindo
description: Cuts objects with precision.

name: Confringo
description: Causes an explosion upon impact.

name: Rennervate
description: Revives a stunned or unconscious person.

name: Incarcerous
description: Conjures ropes to bind a target.
